text: The name John K could refer to: *John K. Davis – (died July 31, 2019) former United States Marine Corps four-star general *John K. Rafferty – (died February 17, 2021) former American politician *John Kricfalusi – Canadian blogger, former animator, and voice actor *John Kufuor – Ghanaian politician *John K. Singlaub – (died January 29, 2022) former American OSS officer *John K. Watts – (died 3 June 2017) former Australian rules football player, radio broadcaster, and television personality
title: John K
